channel.title: [PimpScape] Array Index Out Of Bounds Exception?

item.title: [PimpScape] Array Index Out Of Bounds Exception?
item.dc:creator: @dmannn0120 dmannn0120
item.description:
@dmannn0120 wrote:

So I’m trying to add herblore to my server, did a few of the codes and I know they work, but when I use the two items on each other, it disconnects me then logs me back into the server and an error appears in the run.bat file as follows…

http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/594/arrayindexoutofboundsex.jpg/

The code I am using for my herblore is…

//dylans potion making if (actionTimer == 0) { //attack potion (3) if (itemUsed == 249 && useWith == 227 || itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 249) { deleteItem(249, getItemSlot(249), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); addItem(121, 1); addSkillXP(15, 250); sendMessage("You combine the ingredients to make a potion."); actionTimer = 3; } if (itemUsed == 255 && useWith == 227 && playerLevel[15] > 21 || itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 255 && playerLevel[15] > 21) { deleteItem(255, getItemSlot(255), 1); deleteItem(227, getItemSlot(227), 1); addItem(127, 1); addSkillXP(15, 500); sendMessage("You combine the ingredients to make a potion."); actionTimer = 3; } else if (itemUsed == 255 & useWith == 227 && playerLevel[15] < 22 || itemUsed == 227 && useWith == 255 && playerLevel[15] < 22) { sendMessage("You need a herblore level of 22 to mix these ingredients."); } }

Thoughts? Please help.

Read full topic
item.source: [PimpScape] Array Index Out Of Bounds Exception?
